official-title.#text:
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide payment under part A of the Medicare
			 Program on a reasonable cost basis for anesthesia services furnished by an
			 anesthesiologist in certain rural hospitals in the same manner as payments
			 are provided for anesthesia services furnished by anesthesiologist
			 assistants and certified registered nurse anesthetists in such hospitals.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Medicare Access to Rural Anesthesiology Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Medicare Access to Rural Anesthesiology Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Medicare part A payment for anesthesiologist services in certain rural hospitals based on CRNA
			 pass-through rules

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by adding at the end the
			 following new subsection:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 1814 of the Social Security Act

header.#text: Anesthesiologist Services Provided in Certain Rural Hospitals

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
in the same manner as payment is made under the exception
			 provided in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 9320(k) of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of
			 1986

text.#text:
Notwithstanding any other provision of this title, coverage and payment shall be provided under
			 this part for physicians’ services that are anesthesia services furnished
			 by a physician who is an anesthesiologist in a rural hospital described in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
(relating to payment on a reasonable cost,
			 pass-through basis), for certified registered nurse anesthetist services
			 furnished by a certified registered nurse anesthetist in a hospital
			 described in such section.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 6132 of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act
			 of 1989

text.#text:
No payment shall be made under any other provision of this title for physicians’ services for which
			 payment is made under this subsection.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 9320(k) of the
			 Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1986

text.#text: A rural hospital described in this paragraph is a hospital described in

term.#tail: is deemed a reference to a

text.#text: any reference in such section to a

term.#tail: is deemed a reference to such date and year as the Secretary shall specify.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall apply to services furnished during cost reporting
			 periods beginning on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.
